5 Colors:Purple, Green, Pink, Blue, Orange. each colour has 1 pair (2pcs)
Size adjustable:11x 4.7 inches,elastic cord design, not easy to fall off from your foot,Free size to fit most people (adults and kids), Can use it with barefoot or as a shoes cover

Easy to use & Washable: Just left them on your shoes and walk around and it picks up all the dust and hair without bending down or kneeling. These mop slippers can be washed by washing machine or hand

Multi-functional:You can add it to a mopping head of your home, can be wore with or without shoes; The mopping shoes cover can be used in wiping family floor, washing cars, washing desks, cleaning window glass while added to a mop head. So many ways of using!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Package Contents 1 Pair of Pink shoes slipper1 Pair of Blue shoes slipper1 Pair of Purple shoes slipper1 Pair of Green shoes slippe1 Pair of Orange shoes slippe Free Size With elastic strap to fit most sizes of shoes (10 - 13inches ). And the soft material makes these mop slipper shoes fit both men and women, adult and kids well. It can be used barefoot or as a shoe cover as well. Safe For Any Floor Our microfiber mop slipper shoes will not scratch your floors and offer the benefit of gripping the dirt or debris while being gentle on your floors. They are perfect for use on wood floors, tile floors, linoleum floors, cement floors, most walls. You won't have to bend over to mop the floor anymore.

Multi-purpose Dust Mops They can be set in mop as a mop head, used to wipe glass mirrors, wipe window glass and sliding glass doors , or washing the car, etc. Best performance of absorbing water and dust moping with microfiber. You won't have to bend over to mop the floor anymore. Machine Washable Put it in the washing machine for cleaning. When it dries, you will get an almost new one. Very simple and efficient. They are completely reusable. Chenille Fiber / Microfiber Super soft, washable and reusable, high absorbing ability, protect the surface of the floor while wiping. Lint free and unfading, best for long time use. Just wearing these mop slippers makes the whole house beautiful! Must have for household cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more cleaning with dirty shoes/socks/feet
reviews.reviewText: These are great when we mop the floors - we don't have to worry about walking on the clean floor with dirty shoes, socks or even barefoot and if the floor is wet, it just helps dry it. Easy to change into a fresh pair too. Then I just throw them in the washer, dryer and store them for next time. Fun to wear too...they don't feel weird or anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect house slippers!
reviews.reviewText: I love these little mop shoes/slippers. You will not slip - which was my worry before I bought them. I do not have many rug areas and those floors sure can get dirty. Instead of going barefoot - which is my wont - I wear these and arrive at the end of the day with clean feet and cleaner floors. Perfect to wear while you clean - but I wear my all the time in the house. Throw them in the wash with the towels - good as new! They stay on easily and are not too tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They’re too small for most men and some women
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to wear as shoe covers on my new laminate floor. Transitioning from carpet to hard surface floors has been hard on my feet ;) so I like to wear my athletic shoes when I’m on feet a lot or cleaning. I thought it would be great to pick up a little dust at the same time. Here’s my thoughts:1. These don’t really pick up dirt with normal walking on a dry floor. They do keep you from tracking it around with your shoes.2. They are Amazing when wet mopping because they help dry the floor if you kinda shuffle while mopping. Laminate floors are sensitive to water so this is great!!! They end up dirty on the bottom by the time I’m done, so they must be picking up any dirt the microfiber mop left behind.3. They’re kinda small but stretchy. I wear an 8.5 and these barely fit over my shoes. I’ve worn them with bare feet but they put pressure on my big toe kinda like pantyhose do with dress shoes. Also the nubs feel a little weird to walk on.If you have women’s size 8.5 or smaller these should work for you! I will try to update my review to include their durability once they’ve been through the wash a few times :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun way to clean. Cute novelty gift
reviews.reviewText: I love these little slippers. They are like wearing little mops on your feet. My sister gave me a package of them and I started to buy them for friends. They slip over your shoe and stretch to fit my 8 1/2 sized foot. I slide around my hardwood floors and it cleans up all the dust off the floor. They are good in corners where it is sometimes hard to clean with a dust mop. Fun, novelty product. Shipping was very fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better for smaller feet.
reviews.reviewText: Good at picking up dust and hiar, though the wearer should have smaller feet, they won't stay real well on my size 12s. These wrok well on hardwood floors but not on any kind of carpet, even short nap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Theyd be better if a bit more structured and thicker
reviews.reviewText: I have a huge marble floor which gets really dirty from parties- food and wine sloshing etc...I often "skate" with thick, folded, damp towels under my feet so i thought these might be perfect.They DO stay on my feet better but i wish they had a stiffer, broader shape. Still, since they come in a pack of 5 pairs, thats convenient and they're easy to wash. Im glad i bought them. I just think there should be a better deaigned version out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Like a Charm
reviews.reviewText: My mom mops the floors in her home frequently and usually uses the same towels in rotation to protect the floor from making foot prints. I saw these and thought they’d be a perfect gag gift for Mother’s Day, and I was right. She absolutely loves them. They are too small to fit on my large feet, but they fit her perfectly. They really do collect a lot of dust when just walking around in them as well. They are the highest quality, but they get the job done and in a bunch of fun colors. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I bought these as a joke for a Christmas gift exchange. But I ended up like in them and keeping one pair and gifting a few others! Everyone has sent me pics of them wearing them and it’s hilarious and fun. I’m glad I could bring some laughs and function at the same time!
Keep my feet dry while cleaning and help leave my floors spotless while mopping

amazing how something so simple can make a difference when cleaning. Nice to not leave footprints all over the place when you are cleaning the floor. Not of the highest quality - seems coming apart at places - but I still like them and would recommend.
I love wearing these when I wash my hardwood floors you can walk where you just mopped and doesn’t leave foot prints.
